title: Gullied Crater
description: This is the location with the most impressive known gully activity in the Northern hemisphere. Gullies are active in the winter due to carbon dioxide frost, but northern winters are shorter and warmer than southern winters, so there is less frost and less gully activity.
theme:
MARS. The Red Planet, one of the most desirable
destinations for humanity
